sourcesContent:
import { ReactElement } from 'react'; export function Projects(): ReactElement { return ( <>

Funded Research Projects

  • More recent funded projects are avaiable at{' '} here
  • Diagnosing Energy Inefficiencies in Mobile Applications based on Observable Sensory Data Utilization (611813)
  • Fault Detection of Event-Driven Mobile Applications Using Static Analysis (611912) [事件驅動的移動應用程式錯誤之靜態檢測方法]
  • Effective Regression Fault Detection for the Reuse of Spreadsheets (611811) [電子表格程序復用中錯誤的有效檢測]
  • Detecting Adaptation Faults in Context-aware Pervasive Applications (612210) [普適計算中的適應性錯誤測試]
  • Managing the Impact of Context Reduction on Pervasive Applications (612309) [普適計算中上下文適配對普適應用的影響及消除技術的研究]
  • RFID Intelligent Dock Gate System: aGate Portal (SSRI08/09.EG01) [智能龙门架]
  • RFID Benchmarking Methodology, Report and Tool Support (ITP/022/08LP) [射頻識別基準測試的關鍵技術之方法及應用]
  • A study of Software Fault Localization and Coincidental Correctness (612108) [軟體錯誤定位和偶然正確性的研究]
  • Performance Testing of RFID Embedded Systems (RPC07/08.EG24)
  • Trustworthy RFID Technologies: Methodology and Practice (GHP/044/07LP)
  • RFID Benchmarking: Methodology and Practice (ITP/022/07LP) [无线射频识别基准测试的关键技术之方法及应用]
  • Context Management Support for Ubiquitous Computing (612306) [支援普適計算的上下文管理]
  • 服务计算的开放软件模型与协同机理研究 (NSFC 60736015)
  • A Research Center for Ubiquitous Computing (HKBU 1/05C)
  • An Extensible Fault-based Predicate Testing Toolset for Wireless Sensor Network Software Applications (ITS/076/06) [用於無線感知網絡應用軟件的可擴展性基於錯誤的謂詞測試工具集]
  • Scalable IPTV and Interactive-movie Platforms for Ubiquitous Multimedia Streaming (GHP/045/05) [普適多媒體串流的可延伸網路電視(IPTV)與交互式電影(Interactive-movie)平台]
  • Effective Deployment of Design Patterns for Software Extensibility (DAG05/06.EG40)
  • Next Generation Online Multimedia Collaboration System (UIM/103) - Task 1 Investigator
  • M-Services Collaboration and Integration (HKUST6167/04E) [移动服务的协作和整合]
  • Fingerprinting Digital Entertainment Contents in Internet-Based Delivery (DAG03/04.EG27)
  • Cross-Organizational Process Exceptions (HKUST6170/03E)
  • Agent-Based Collaborative Workforce Management (CUHK 4190/03E)
  • Fault-based Approaches to Specification-based Testing (CITYU 1195/03E)
  • Pattern Conformance Testing of Java Production Systems (HKUST6187/02E)
  • Software for Advertising on Copyright Protected Music (SSRI01/02.BM01)
  • TACCLE: Object-Oriented Software Testing at the Class and Cluster Levels (HKU 7033/99E)
  • Digital Property Rights Infrastructure - Music and Publishing Industry Online Copyright Protection and Content Distribution (AF/168/99)
  • Testing of distributed multimedia software systems (HKUST6159/98E)
  • A Multimedia Architect's Assistant for Distributed Multimedia Applications (HKUST6088/97E)
  • A Middleware for the Authoring of Distributed Multimedia Applications (SSRI96/97.EG08)
  • Techniques and Support Tools for Analysing Distributed Object-Oriented Systems (JRS96/38)
  • An Integrated Environment for Multimedia Applications on heterogeneous Networks (SSRC95/96.EG19)
  • Automated testing and verification of distributed object-oriented software system (HKUST664/95E)
  • Automated behaviour analysis technique for distributed finite-state systems (HKUST662/95E)
  • Automated verification for distributed computing systems (DAG94/95.EG15)
); }
